title: Wednesday Post Show (02-16-22)
itunes:title: Wednesday Post Show (02-16-22)
description:
Bobby starts by talking about how he hasn’t been interested in the Winter Olympics this year. We talk about how Bob Saget’s family have filed a lawsuit to block the release of any more materials relating to the investigation into his death. Amy talks about an awkward encounter she had on her flight where a woman wanted to sit next to the window because she had a disorder. Eddie talks about how he is inspired by Morgan2 and Mike D to work out after the show.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Bobby starts by talking about how he hasn’t been interested in the Winter Olympics this year. We talk about how Bob Saget’s family have filed a lawsuit to block the release of any more materials relating to the investigation into his death. Amy talks about an awkward encounter she had on her flight where a woman wanted to sit next to the window because she had a disorder. Eddie talks about how he is inspired by Morgan2 and Mike D to work out after the show.
